languages.text: Многие дворяне из колонии теряют твердость в Кредо и присоединяются к подозрительным деградантным обществам, предающимся сибаритству и излишнему умствованию.

traits.locale_text: Многие колонисты стали нетверды в Кредо и объединяются в подозрительные деградантные общества.

languages.text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.
languages.original_text: Многие дворяне из колонии теряют твердость в Кредо и присоединяются к подозрительным деградантным обществам, предающимся сибаритству и излишнему умствованию.

traits.locale_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.
Many colonists have became uncertain in their Faith in The Emperor and are joining dubious decadent cults instead.
Many colonists have became uncertain in the Imperial Creed and are joining dubious decadent cults instead.
Many colonists have became uncertain in the Imperial Creed and are joining dubious decadent cults instead.
Many colonists have became uncertain in the Imperial Creed and are joining dubious decadent cults instead.
Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.
Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.

languages.text: 殖民地许多贵族的信仰正在不断动摇，他们甚至还加入了沉溺于银行业、过分求知与倒行逆施的可疑团体。
languages.original_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.

traits.locale_text: 殖民地许多贵族的信仰正在不断动摇，他们甚至还加入了沉溺于银行业、过分求知与倒行逆施的可疑团体。

languages.text: Buena parte de los nobles de la colonia está perdiendo la fe en el Credo para unirse a sociedades retrógradas entregadas al sibaritismo y la teorización excesiva.
languages.original_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.

traits.locale_text: Buena parte de los nobles de la colonia está perdiendo la fe en el Credo para unirse a sociedades retrógradas entregadas al sibaritismo y la teorización excesiva.

languages.text: コロニーの貴族（ノーブル）の多くは信条（クリード）への固い信仰心を失い、奢侈に流れたり、過剰な知識主義に溺れたりと怪しい時代退行的な団体に加わっている。
languages.original_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.

traits.locale_text: コロニーの貴族（ノーブル）の多くは信条（クリード）への固い信仰心を失い、奢侈に流れたり、過剰な知識主義に溺れたりと怪しい時代退行的な団体に加わっている。

languages.text: Viele der Adligen in der Kolonie wenden sich vom Glauben ab und schließen sich verdächtigen rückschrittlichen Gesellschaften an, die sich der Genusssucht und einer übermäßigen Intellektualisierung hingeben.
languages.original_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.

traits.locale_text: Viele der Adligen in der Kolonie wenden sich vom Glauben ab und schließen sich verdächtigen rückschrittlichen Gesellschaften an, die sich der Genusssucht und einer übermäßigen Intellektualisierung hingeben.

languages.text: De nombreux nobles de la colonie perdent la foi qu'ils avaient en le Crédo et rejoignent des sociétés rétrogrades douteuses pour mieux se vautrer dans la luxure et l'intellectualisation excessive.
languages.original_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.

traits.locale_text: De nombreux nobles de la colonie perdent la foi qu'ils avaient en le Crédo et rejoignent des sociétés rétrogrades douteuses pour mieux se vautrer dans la luxure et l'intellectualisation excessive.

languages.text: Kolonideki soyluların büyük kısmı, İtikat'a olan inançlarını kaybetmekte. Zevküsefa edip entelektüelliği abartan şaibeli ve gerici cemiyetlere katılıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Many of the colony's nobles are losing their firmness of belief in the Creed and joining suspicious retrogressive societies indulging in sybaritism and excessive intellectualising.
